title: Barefoot Economics Part I
description: A special guest who is very close to me, and a public health professional, joins me to talk about the Index of Human Needs in the work of Chilean economist Manfred Max-Neef and how a broader conception of human need can change economic theory for the better.  We also tease a future episode that will talk about the overlap between Max-Neef and Sergei Bulgakov.
